titles.title: To congratulate the Green Bay Packers of the National Football League on winning its first National Football Conference (NFC) Central Division title in 23 years and to commend Quarterback Brett Favre for being recognized as the National Football League's Most Valuable Player.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 1/5/1996--Introduced. Congratulates the Green Bay Packers on winning the 1995 National Football Conference Central Division championship. Commends Brett Favre for his performance as quarterback. Recognizes the team's commitment to athletic excellence.
